div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem
nono die mensis Januarij anno Domini Mo iiijcmo lxxxvto / quo die curia affirmata
et sectis vocatis absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die dominus Johannes striuelin capellanus ac procurator altaris beate Katerine accedens ad
barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu v solidorum dicto altari annuatim debit' de
vna terra Jacente in vici viridi inter terram Alexandri de camera ex boriali parte et terram
gilberti murison ex parte australi Ad quam terram accessit et nichil reperit distringi
bile preter terram et lapides quos in curia presentavit tanquam secunda die processus Testibus
Ricardo craufurd Willelmo benyn et philippo Dumbrek seriando

Item the samyn dai the court decretit and ordanit that a balye suld pas and gif
possessioun to the priour of the frer' carmelitis of twa landis recuverit be him
in the hede court eftir yule a yer' bipast eftir the tenour of his process' And the said
priour' at the request of the counsale has consentit gif ony procuratouris of Alexander
leslyis cumis betuix this and the law dai eftir paisch next tocum topay the annuellis
acht of termis bigane of the land pertening til him that thai haf regres to the samen
land and grund et cetera

Item Johne Wormot for him and his fallowis in that part / protestit / that the process' led be
the said priour' of the frer' carmelitis wppon the land awand til him and his falouis
certane annuel / nor the possession grantit til the said priour' tharof / suld nocht tvrn thare
grund annuale to na preiudice in tym cuming

Thesaid dai William more comperit before the assise chosin apon the action betuix
him and William blindsel / and has offerit him tomak it gude sufficently within
terme of law / that he has done til William blindsel in the selling of his half
last of hidis and in the waring of the samyn that a merchand suld do til ane
merchand eftir the tenour of his paper gevin to Wilyeam blindsel tharuppon And
becaus' the said William more allegis that his prefis and document in the said
matir is beyond the sey / the assise has assignit til him yer' and day to
bring the said previs or sufficent document And falyeand tharof the said
William more is condampnit in the saide some' clamit be William blindsel

Wilyeam of abirdour' procuratour for Robert steuart has gevin caucion and cumis
ful procuratour to tyne and wyn for the said robert / anent al matiris that
Jhone the vaus has to folow him of et cetera

Eodem die Johannes chapman super quem Johannes de lammyntoun' inuenit plegium pro
iniusta detencione liiij s' et x d' ab eo / primo die vocatus ad comparendum et respondendum
dicto plegio / non comparuit / Ideo precipitur moricio besat seriando quod capto districto ab
eodem ipsum summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

the assise has decretit William of geruiach quyte fra the clame of Androw
vaus of j met of salt

The xiij dai of Januar' the yer' et cetera lxxxv / gilbert morison grantis him awand
til William of abirdour' twa hambre barellis of salmond ful rede and sweit
for the tak of the thrid part of a net of the pot on the wattir of Dee Tobe
pait til the said Wilyeam at mydsummyr or lammes next tocum at the farrest
but langar delay In witnes heirof the said gilbert has subscriuit this
present write with his hand / and bundin and oblist him his landis and gudis
mouabil and vnmouable to the payment of the said salmond be the fath
of his body in the stratast fourm of obligacion I Gylbert morysone
manu propria

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samyn the xvj
dai of Januar' the yer' forsaid It was fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn' assis'
eftir the deposicion of the witnes producit before thaim / that Wil of balheluy is
dettour' til mastir William vmfray of half a barel of salmond with the
quhilk he wrangwisly intromettit beyond the sey withoute command' of the
said mastir Wilyeam / and that he suld mak rekning and payment tharof the
said mastir William within terme of law eftir the tenor of his bil that brate
til his merchand tharuppon / And for the said wranguis' intrometting a of bal
heluy is in amerciament of the court et cetera

Androw lammynton' is adiugit in amerciament for the strublance of marion' ste
vinson and til amend til hir as law wil

William gelisson skippar producit in Jugement thir persons vndirwritin in the action'
betuix him and Alexander sanchar' quhilkis sworn and examnit deponit be thar'
athis made in presence of parties as eftir folowis that ych
Johneson first witnes declaris that he herd the said skippar say that he
had in his schip of Alexander sancharis xv barellis of salmond / and that
James of Douglas had j barel of salmond of the said al
for the custum as the skippar sayd Androw gillespy secund witnes
deponis be his aith that he passit twyis' fra the schip til the fischhous'
in fyndern for a barel of salmond of alexander sancharis and couthe nocht get
it / and thareftir com again for it / and gat twa barellis of salmond in Sande
fynlasonis fischhous' and brocht thaim to the schip / bot quha acht thaim he wist nocht

The xx dai Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv In the court haldin be the ballies
of abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samyn . Johne talyour' was folowit be the aldir
man in the kingis name and accusit be the ballies of art and part of the wrangwis' away putting
of Jhone of burn . that was attachit and put in the tolbuthe for the bringing of wrang
wis' and fenyeit cunye of plakkis within this burgh . the quhilk the said John' talyour
with his forspekar' Johne Wormot denyit / and tuke him to the knaulage
of ane assis' of thir personis that is to say Robert blindsel Johne of Knollis
Dauid menyeis yungar Dauid symson thomas prat William of abirdour androw
branche William of Kintor androw culan eldar thom of marr' androw murray eldar
Dauid marr' Walter achneve adam of crafurd and John' stewart The quhilk
assise the gret aith sworn and riply avisit fand and deliuerit the forsaid John'
talyour quyte of al art and part of the away putting of the said Jhon of burn et cetera

The assise fyndis gilbert the vaus dischargit anent Johne of catnes of xiiij s' for
a kyst and clathis that was in it tane for the annuel clamit be the said Jhon' And thai
ordane the said gilbert toga til compt and rekning and pay to Jhone of catnes
sa fer as he is vnpait of his annuel of termis bigain / and sa fer as the said
gilbert can preve pait salbe allowit

The xxj dai of Januar' before William blindsel ane of the ballies James Kennerty and
the lady of Derris admittit the persons vndirwritin to depone in the caus' folouand
sworn in presence of the parties Johne the vaus first witnes declaris that the twa
noblis' layd in wed til James Kennerty be the lady of Derris and him war layd for iij li'
and na mare / and na day made to the outgreting of thaim Malcum of murray second witnes
sais that he wist na forthir than the ij noblis' war laid in wed for iij li' and the
lave of the gold and siluer that scho deliuerit that tym til the said James he tuke in payment

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxiijo die Ja
nuarij anno Domini et cetera lxxxv

quo die Johannes chepman secundo die vocatus ad sectam Jo
hannis lammynton' / non comparuit quare precipitur philippo Dunbrek secundo capere districtum et cetera
et premunire eundem Johannem chepman ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

The samen dai It was fundin and ordanit be ane sworn assise that James Kennerty
sal deliuer to the lady of Durris ane hary nobil a ryal nobil he takand
tharfor thre pundis for the quhilkis thai war pawndit / and for the wrangwis' with
haldin of the said twa noblis' eftir the said some' was offerit til him for the oute
quyting of thaim / the said James was adiugit in amerciament of the court et cetera

Item the said dai Jhone Wormot present til John' stevinson ane of the ballies ane
commission' of our Soueran lordis vndir his signet direct to the aldirman and balyeis
of abirdene chargeand thaim til assigne ane dai to the said John' Wormot for the
resaving of his witnes to prefe ane obligacion of x li' g' clamit apon him
be the spous' of vmquhile Alexander howison tobe dischargit sufficiently
the quhilk commission' beand red John' Wormot deliuerit the witnes in write
that suld depone in the said matir to the balye forsaid / And thar wes as
signit til him for the resaving of thar deposicionis friday the xxvij dai of
Januar' instant / and the partie is ordanit tobe warnit toher' the witnes sworn' et cetera

The said dai comperit before the ballies Alexander sanchar' and tuke to bring sufficent certifi
cacion fra the custumaris of fores betuix this and paisch / that thar was na barel of salmond'
of his haldin be the custumaris of fores na elgyn nor be nane vthir personis for
custum nor vthir dettis the last tyme that William gelisson skippar was thare And
that certificacion' beand brocht vndir the custumaris seil of a balyeis seil of fores
or elgyn the said skippar is oblist to content and pay til Alexander sanchar for the barel
of salmond that he clamys him j li' g' in flandris betuix this and Witsunday next
tocum or thre li' scottis in abirdene at the wil of the said alexander And the said skippar has
set thom prat souerty for the said payment tobe made in maner' and fourm before expremit

The xxiiij dai of the said moneth of Januar' In the court haldin in the tol
buthe be the ballies / William more callit tocomper' at the instance of Wil
liam blindsel as he that was / warnit to this dai be thom of chamer
ane of the ballies comperit nocht / the quhilk warning beand previt in the
court be gilbert morison and Androw vaus tharto sworn' Wilyeam blindsel
opinly protestit that quhat thing William more fra this dai furth did
anent the leding of his preif in the action' betuix thaim of demj last of
sen he wald nocht compere towarn the said William blindsel of
tyme of production of the said preif like as he was chargit sen
now on his viage and the schip redy tosayl / that the said William blindsel
procuratouris mycht be present tohere the prefis sworn for his interess' in the
matir / that it suld tvrn him to na preiudice in tym tocum

The samyn dai William of balhelvy quhilk was ordanit be ane assis' of be
fore to freith and releve John' more of fyve s' g' anent Walter achneif has
bundin and oblist him to pay the said some' of v s' g' til Arnald ovirdale factour
til the said Johne apon this next rais' / And falyeand of the payment tharof than
that he sal pay for it as it is borowit for lent siluer hame

The ballies be the decreit of the court has assignit to fyndlaw fores the law dai
eftir paisch next tocum toprefe his clame of the poyntis of his bil apon thom
symson of the quhilk bil the copy is decernit to the said thomas And it is orda
nit that the witnes salbe resauit to depone in the said action quhat tym thai salbe
producit in the meintym the said thomas or his procuratouris beand warnit tohere thaim
sworn And John' of lammyntoun is producit for a witnes and sworn in presence of the
parties todepone in friday next tocum

Item Thomas symson has fundin alexander sanchar' law borch for him that fyndlaw fores
salbe vnscathit and vndistrublit vthirwais than law wil And in like wyis'
William quelp is becumin law borgh for the said fyndlau / that thom symson
salbe vndistrublit et cetera

The xxvj dai of Januar' the counsale and brethir of gild has ordanit Johne stewart for
the offens done be him til thom prat in word in presence of the ballies and consale / to pay to
the haly blude lycht j li' of wax / And that he forbere sic trespas in tym cuming againis
ony of the bredir of gild vndir the pain of xxtj s' tobe rasit of him til saint necolace wark
Curia ballivorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die mensis Januarij predicti

quo die Dauid Kintor prosecutus fuit Alexandrum fynlason per plegium porrectum super
eum et Willelmum cardny pro iniusta detencione iij librorum ad bonum compotum et dictus alexander pe
ciit diem legalem ad respondendum et Willelmus blindsel vnus ballivorum assignavit eidem diem
lune ad octo dies et dictus balliuus ordinauit ad premuniendum Willelmum cardny ad eundem
diem ad respondendum in dicta causa

the samen dai fyndlaw fores quhilk was warnit to this dai and callit til answer' to the
borgh strekin apon him be thomas symson for the wranguis' halding of the fracht
of vj hambre barellis of gret salt / ij barellis of sa barellis of vl
oute of orknay til Abirdene and x s' siluer of fracht anent Johne of Wellis / compe
rit nocht / quharfor the said thomas askit the said fyndlau tobe condampnit in the
said fracht and siluer sen it concernit fracht and acht na langar proces than thre tydis
quhilk was assignit til him be the ballies / and tharuppon the court avisit de
cretit and it was for dome gevin that the said Thomas symson was cumin til
his clame of the said fracht and siluer againis the said fyndlau tobe pait til
him within terme of law And thir ar the names of the wardaris in the said action
Alexander chamer of murchil Alexander menyeis David menyeis John of Knollis John' Wor
mot gilbert the vaus gilbert nevison alexander trail and vthiris diuers'

Curia tenta per ballivos huius burgi in pretorio eiusdem penultimo die Januarij anno Domini et cetera
lxxxvto /

quo die per decretum curie ballivi assignarunt thome quhite hodie ad octo
dies pro die peremptorio ad respondendum plegio porrecto super eum per henricum owrum pro
iniusta detencione v s' g' ad bonum compotum

Meg styl marion' broyis' the wif of Jhone of narn the wif of androw smyth
and androw lippis wif convict be assis' ilkane in amerciament for the wranguis' bre
king of the statute made of the candil Item the said androw smythis wif in amerciament
for selling of viij penny ail And the said wif of Androw lip convict for the
making and selling of diuers' wechtis of candil bettyr til ane than ane vthir
And the assis' has ordanit gif the candil makaris defautis in tym cuming as
thai haf done / that thai salbe expellit the craft for a yer'

the samen dai Androw branche in the name of alexander scrogis strekit ane borgh
apon Jhone chepman eldar that sen the said John' drew the said Alexander souerty for
him til Jhone Wormot for the payment of twa barellis of salmond or four'
merkis of siluer eftir the tenour of the poyntment / that he wrangis becaus' he re
levis nocht and kepis vnscathit alexander scrogis anent Jhon' Wormot of the said
souerty And the said John' chepman be his forspekar Jhone the vaus askit
ane lachful day til ansuer' to the borch and thar wes assignit tharto monunday
next tocum the said Johne the vaus is becumin souerty to the ballies topay
it that salbe lachfully optenit apon Johne chepman forsaid

James iowale has fundin Jhone the vaus law borgh for him and his party
that Wilyeam of geruach and his party salbe scathles bot be way of law
And for the said William Dauid mathoson is law borch in like wyis'

In the court haldin be the ballies the last dai of Januar' / Will of buchan
baxtar convict be assis' is adiugit in amerciament for breking of the statute of th
that wald nocht baik breid redy to serue the toune quhen he had stuf / et cetera

Sande lammynton' Wil of lammyntoun and thom narne ilkane in amerciament for thare
absence thai beand warnit be the officeris

the samyn dai before the ballies in Jugement Androw Kyntor son and ayr of vmquhile
androw Kintor personaly comperit / and has made constitute and ordanit Alexander traile
Ranald talyour and marion' his modir coniunctlie and seueraly cessionaris and procuratouris
til him topersew folou and recuvir of the ayris and executouris of quhilum gilbert Kintor
and al vthiris quhom it efferis al gudis pertening til him of ayrschip be the dis
ces of his fadir or vthirwais quhatsumevir / promittand tohald ferm and stable' et cetera

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem vjto die februarij anno
Domini et cetera lxxxv /

quo die Johannes chepman senior primo die vocatus responsurus plegio super eum
porrecto ex parte Alexandri scrogis / non comparuit / quare precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando capere
districtum de dicto Johanne chepman si fuerit distringibilis alioquin de Johanne vaus suo
caucionario / et cetera et premunire dictum Johannem chepman ad comparendum in proxima curia lega
li tanquam secundo die huius processus

The samen dai the aldirman and ballies has assignit til maistir Androw cadiow wed
nisdai next tocum for his profis tobe producit anent the profite of ane half nettis fisching
of the raik of the yer' last bipast clamit be him apon Alexander chamer eldar Jhon'
of Knollis and Alexander chamer yungar and anent his expensis and costis made tharup
pon eftir the tenour of our soueran lordis lettres direct to the aldirman and ballies tharuppon

the said dai philp of Dunbrek seriand at the command' of the Aldirman and ballies warnit and
chargit Alexander rede thom of marr' and Dauid Kyntor tocomper' before the aldirman and
ballies on Wednisdai next tocum todepone and bere witnes in the action of x li' g'
be ane obligacion clamit apon him be the spous' of vmquhile Alexander howison'
eftir the tenour of our soueran lordis lettres

Johannes chepman tercio die vocatus ad sectam Johannis lammynton' non comparuit / Ideo precipitur
moricio besat seriando quod capto districto ab eodem ipsum summoneat ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorium diem huius processus

Alexander fynlauson primo die vocatus ad respondendum plegio inuento super eum et Willelmum cardny
per Dauid Kintor non comparuit / precipitur seriando ad capiendum districtum et cetera et ad premuniendum ipsum
alexandrum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus / Et Willelmus cardny
tunc presens in curia citatur ad eundem diem responsurus dicto plegio pro secundo die

The samyn dai Johne malisson apon quham Androw louson strekit ane borgh' that
in sa fer as he was merchand to the said andro of ijC skinis of slachtir and intromettit
tharwith he suld gif him compt rekning and payment / and wrangis that he dois it
nocht oft tymis callit as he that was warnit to this dai til ansuer' comperit nocht
quharfor the ballies and specialy William blindsel with avise and ordinance of the
consale chargit the seriand to distres the said Jhon' malisson' and to warn him to
comper' in the court of this burgh on Wednisdai the viij dai of this moneth as
dai peremptour til ansuer' to the said borgh'

the Aldirman ballies and counsale has assignit til William lutar' xlij s' of Ro
bert blindselis wattir mail of the pot and twa merkis of Androw branche of the fuyr
dis tobe pait to the said William of his pension' of this instant yer' And the aldirman
and ballies sal mak the said Wilyeam be pait of the remanent of his pension' of
sex merkis

the ballie William blindsel with consent of henry owrum has assignit til thom
quhite to preve this dai before him at thre eftir none that he intromettit with
na gudis of the said henryis bot xv g' / And falyeand of his preif' tobe
condampnit in the v s' g' clamit apon him be the said henry
Curia tenta per balliuos de Abirdene in pretorio ixo die februarii anno Domini et cetera lxxxvto

quo die ballivi per decretum curie assignarunt Willelmo de Kintor diem lune proximo
pro die peremptorio ad respondendum Willelmo necolson pro iniusta detencione v solidorum et viij d'

Eodem die philippus quhitehede constituit dominum Johannem ruthirfurd prepositum
suum procuratorem in omnibus causis placitis et querelis sibi concernentibus / et signant' ad
prosequendum et defendendum terras et annuos redditus sibi pertinen' racione sponse sue
ellene hervy ac debita quecumque Et promisit de Rato et cetera

Actio prosecuta per andream lowson aduersus Johannem malisson vt patet supra / per
partes ponitur determinacionj Jacobi lesly Johannis colison andree Wenton thome
marr' andree branche et gilberti mvrison iurati ad fidelitatem decidendum
eandem secundum eorum conscienciam et intellectum Et partes predicte fidemedia obligantur
ad standum eorundem decreto / et temptabunt dictam materiam crastina die et
si voluerint vnum virum eis eligere in casu discordie eligant Et pronunciabunt
deliberacionem suam citra hodie ad octo dies

Eodem die patricius stiklaw et Johannes sclatar accusati per balliuos de perturbacione
iniusta / convicti sunt per assisam iuratam de huiusmodi perturbacione iniusta et ideo ipsorum q
adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabit alter alteri ad visum proborum Et dictus patricius
in emendam soluet vnam libram cere ad missam Sancti sanguinis / et prefatus Johannes
contribue dimediam libram cere dicte misse et altari sancti sanguinis infra ecclesiam parochialem

The same day before the baillies sittand in Jugement Thomas of marr' and Joh has
perofferit him til vndirly and abyde before thame as his Jugis ordinar the Sentence
and determinacione of law of all summonis and clame anentis Johne the hayes
merchand of lyle in ony thing that he has tosay til him belanging ony obliga
ciones that he has of the said thomas or sowmes of siluer that he aw til
him / and specialie tweching sex pundis gret' of vsuale monee of flandris for
the quhilkis he has gert the said thomas hafe beyn summond be our'
souerane lordis lettres tocomper before our said souerane lord and his consel toanswer
at theinstance of the said Johne eftir the tenour of the said lettres apon the quhilk
peroffer the said thomas has askit with instance ane testimoniale vndir Thomas of fifis
seil ane of the bailliez

Actio mota inter Willelmum Rettre et Dauid crukschank continetur vsque hodie ad octo dies
statu quo nunc cum consensu parcium sine preiudicio alicuius partis per assisam ad determinacionem eiusdem
cause per dictas partes electam et Juratam cui interfuerunt Andreas scherar' prepositus
Ricardus de Kyntor Johannes marr' andreas alani Johannes Knollis alexander blindsel
Dauid h colison alexander howison Willelmus hay et adam de crafurd

Item actio inter Dauid mathoson alexandrum rede et Ricardum culan hodie prosecuta et pendens
secundum actum prescriptum penes Willelmum filium quondam Johannis mathei Respectuatur per prepositum et consilium
in forma et effectu quibus nunc ad diem veneris proximam Ad quam diem precipitur
dicto Dauid portare et venire causare coram prefatis preposito et communi consilio dominum
Johannem de Janna ob huiusmodi materie decisionem

Johannes Wormot eodem die calumpniavit Thomam scrogs super iniusta detencione xxti s' ab eodem
qui tho. pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum dicte calumpnie et assignabant ballivi eidem diem
lune ad octo dies proximo sequente et cetera
